body:
gofmt works on files, not packages, so tags aren't applicable.

goimports also mostly works on files but can scan packages in GOPATH to find symbols. But because it's invoked via your editor, it can't take any options, nor do we want its interface to diverge from gofmt.

I wasn't convinced that #9310 was a problem, either, so it's premature to be finding workarounds.
